patterns: What can you tell me about India
What do you know about India
responses: India is a country in South Asia. It is Seventh-largest country by area. Second most populous country in World. Most populous democracy in the world.

patterns: Give me some facts about India
What do you know about India
responses: Constitution of India is the longest written constitution in the world, including 448 Articles in 22 parts, 12 schedules and 97 amendments. Wriiten by Dr. Bhimrao Ambedkar
'Jana Gana Mana' is the National Anthem of India, it was originally written in bengali by Rabindranath Tagore.
The popular game 'snake and ladders' was originated in India.
India was the first country to mine diamonds.
Hinduism is one of the oldest religion in the world and its not a true polytheism.
Sunday ko aa, sunday ko. Mast naha dho ke aana.
Cows are considered as sacred here.
It is home to a large variety of religions. Unity in diversity
It has 29 states. Uttar Pradesh is the largest state in the country.
New Delhi is the Capital of India. And Mumbai is the financial capital of India
India got its freedom from British Government on 15th August, 1947 after so many efforts put by our freedom fighters. Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru was the First Prime minister of India.
National Sport - Hockey, National bird - Peacock, National Animal- Lion, National Flower - Lotus.
